Paper.Title: Restructuring Tagged Corpora with Morpheme Adjustment Rules

Section.SectionTitle: Abstract Toshihisa Tashiro Noriyoshi Uratani Tsuyoshi Morimoto ATR Interpreting Telecommunications Research Labor~tories
Section.Paragraph: {tashiro,uratani,morimoto} ~itl.at r.co.jp A part-of-speech tagged corpus is a very hnportant knowledge source for natural language processing researchers. This paper proposes a me,hod of converting tagged corpora frOlll olte lllorphellle system to allother,
